paper_abstract: This paper develops a guaranteed cost networked control (GCNC) method for Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy systems with time delays. The state feedback controller is designed via the networked control system (NCS) theory. The stability of the overall fuzzy system using GCNC is also established. Network-induced delay in network transmission and packet dropout are analyzed. Some deductions are also extended to uncertain systems. Simulation results show the validity of the present control scheme.
paper_title: Guaranteed cost networked control for T-S fuzzy systems with time delays
